page.title: 01General Description
page.content: We have planned a walk around our Domesday area. The walk uses public footpaths,bridal ways,tow-paths and a minor road. The walk is being published by the Northamptonshire library service and is obtainable from them or Kilsby school. Our area has two main centres of civilasation although one, Kilsby, is only partly in our block. The area is mainly agricultural. The southern four squares feature a ridge. Local tradition has it that you have to travel to Moscow to reach a similar elevation when you are travelling east. The eight northerly squares feature afertile valley crossed by main road, rail and canal routes.
